---

Load libraries 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(car)
library(MASS)
library(stargazer)
library(effects)
library(ggplot2)
```

Read in raw Alachua County Tick Data 
```{r}
ticks <- read.csv("AlachuaTicksAllSites.csv")
str(ticks)
```

Summarize the number of ticks collected by site, species, lifestage, and visit
```{r}
table1 <- ticks %>%
  group_by(Site_ID, Species, Lifestage, Visit) %>%
  summarise(total = n())

head(table1)
```
